text: Great job! Now for a real challenge. You'll see a shape with colored sides. Your mission is to figure out the length of each colored side using a special on-screen ruler that you can drag around.   Once you measure a side, enter its length in the input box. Let's see what you've got!

sentences.text: You'll see a shape with colored sides.
Your mission is to figure out the length of each colored side using a special on-screen ruler that you can drag around.
Once you measure a side, enter its length in the input box.
